annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) providing for administrative hearings deadlines during a public health emergency, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-326, May 27, 2020, 67 DCR 7045).

For temporary (90 days) providing for administrative hearings deadlines during a public health emergency, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-328, June 8, 2020, 67 DCR 7598).
For temporary (225 days) creation of §2-1851.01, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Temporary Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Law 23-130, Oct. 9, 2020, 67 DCR 8622).

For temporary (90 days) providing for administrative hearings deadlines during a public health emergency, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-30, Mar. 17, 2021, 68 DCR 003101).

For temporary (90 days) providing for administrative hearings deadlines during a public health emergency, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-96, June 7, 2021, 68 DCR 006025).

For temporary (225 days) providing for administrative hearings deadlines during a public health emergency, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-9, June 24, 2021, 68 DCR 004824).

For temporary (90 days) providing for administrative hearings deadlines during a public health emergency, see § 2 of Office of Administrative Hearings Unemployment Appeals Extension Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-167, July 25, 2021, 68 DCR 009485).

For temporary (90 days) providing for administrative hearings deadlines during a public health emergency, see § 2 of Office of Administrative Hearings Unemployment Appeals Extension Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-193, Nov. 1, 2021, 68 DCR 011599).

For temporary (225 days) providing for administrative hearings deadlines during a public health emergency, see § 2 of Office of Administrative Hearings Unemployment Appeals Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-50, Dec. 29, 2021, 68 DCR 011640).
